content.text: I am a single scientist who uses makeup to feel confident and powerful. I sell clothing on facebook and love cosplay. I would love to learn how to play the guitar like the Red Hot Chili Peppers and I love children.

Hi there! I am a writer who enjoys the simple things in life, like cuddling with my dog on a rainy day. My relationships are the most valuable thing I own because they are a source of joy and support. I am a recovering alcoholic, a student, and my family is in business. I also like to garden and grow sunflowers.
That's a lot of cool things you have going on! I love the idea of cuddling with your dog on a rainy day. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog named Moose and he is the best dog in the world! He is such a great listener and he always makes me laugh.
I bet he's a great cuddler too! What are some of your favorite things to garden? I love sunflowers, but I'm not very good at gardening.
I love growing sunflowers, too! They are so beautiful and they always make me smile. I also like growing tomatoes, peppers, and cucumbers. I'm not very good at gardening either, but I enjoy it!
I bet it's really rewarding to grow your own food. What are your favorite things to write about?
I love writing about all sorts of things, but my favorite topics are relationships, family, and life lessons. I also enjoy writing short stories and poems.
Those are all great topics! I would love to read some of your writing sometime.
Thanks! I'd be happy to share some of my work with you.
